getFilterDefinition.description: Returns a single filter definition by id

getFilterDefinitionCollection.description: Returns a collection of filter definitions

putFilterDefinition.description: Creates or Updates a filter definition by id

deleteFilterDefinition.description: Deletes a filter definition by id

postFilterDefinitionCopy.description: Copies a filter definition from selected id

patchFilterDefinition.description: Updates a filter definition by id

postRefreshFilteredList.description: Refreshes a filtered list by id

patchFilteredList.description: Updates specific parameter on a filtered list by id

getList.description: Returns a single list by id.

getListCollection.description: Returns a collection of lists by categoryID.

getListSubscriberStatusCounts.description: Returns an object that contains the subscriber status counts for the list Id specified.

getMeasuresCollection.description: Returns a collection of measures by categoryID.

getMeasure.description: Returns a single instance of the measure specified by the id.

getSubscriberCounts.description: Returns a collection of listIds and SubscriberCounts from a list of listIds.

getSubscriberCountByListId.description: Returns a listId and SubscriberCount from a list of listId.

patchList.description: Updates specific parameter on a single list by id.

getFilteredList.description: Returns a single filtered list by id.

getRandomList.description: Returns a single random list by id.

postCreateSharedCategory.description: Creates a shared category.  Only supported for Ent 2.0 accounts.

postMigrateFilteredList.description: Migrates a filtered list from the rules based engine to the filtered based engine

postLastRefreshedByNamesByListId.description: Gets the last refreshed by names for the list of filtered lists supplied in the payload

getActiveUserAnnouncements.description: Get all active Announcements for the user

getOneSubscriberV2.description: Get one Subscriber using an updated entity object

getSubscriberListV2.description: Get Subscribers by ListID using an updated entity object

postCopySubscribersByList.description: Copy all Subscribers from source list into target list

postMoveSubscribersByList.description: Move all Subscribers from source list into target list

postCopySubscribersBySubscriberIDs.description: Copy selected Subscribers from source list into target list

postMoveSubscribersBySubscriberIDs.description: Move selected Subscribers from source list into target list

deleteSubscriberFromAllLists.description: Deletes the Subscriberid from all lists

deleteSubscriberFromSpecifiedListOnly.description: Deletes the Subscriberid from specified listid

getExportFilesize.description: Get estimated filesize of a Data Extension

getWhitelist.description: Get whitelist status of an email address

getCategory.description: Retrieves a category based on provided id

getCategoryChildren.description: Retrieves a collection of child categories based on provided id

postSharedCategory.description: Creates a shared category.  Only supported for Ent 2.0 accounts.
